sense.def:
A comb
je ploščat pripomoček iz plastike ali kovine z dolgimi, tankimi konicami, s katerim si urejamo lase.

To comb one's hair
pomeni urediti si lase z glavnikom.

seg.quote: They could see Mr Baker busily combing his hair.

sense.def:
To comb a place for something
pomeni natančno preiskati neko področje, da bi nekaj našli.

seg.quote: It might amuse her to comb the town for antiques.
